babel-autocreate-text-levels: Ymmydeyryn ‘sy ronney shoh, t’ad cowraghey dy vel y cheim schleieyn $1 oc ayns $2.
babel-autocreate-text-main:
Ymmydeyryn ‘sy ronney shoh, t’ad cowraghey keim y tushtey oc ayns $1.
$3
babel-0: Cha nel tushtey [[$1|erbee]] ec yn {{GENDER:$4|ymmydeyr}} shoh ayns [[$2|$3]] (ny cha nel agh tushtey feer veg echey).
